cause.description:
The Katelyn Bedard Bone Marrow Association was founded in July 2005 by Bryan and Joanne Bedard of Windsor, Ontario in Canada. Bryan and Joanne were inspired to start this association after losing their daughter Katelyn to Leukemia at the age of 3, when she was not able to find a bone marrow donor.
Visit our website http://www.GiveMarrow.net to learn more. To donate directly to our organization and support our efforts to promote bone marrow and cord blood donations use the "Donate" link on the right or visit https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr. You may also contact us directly through our website at http://www.GiveMarrow.net. Thank you!
1. We raise awareness about the world bone marrow registries
2. We provide financial support to bone marrow transplant patients via our Family Support Program
3. We aim to increase the number of umbilical cord blood units donated to Victoria Angel Registry of Hope, a public Canadian umbilical cord blood bank
4. We sponsor bone marrow transplant research
cause.mission: To promote awareness about worldwide bone marrow registries.
